Yuehong 'Cassandra' Tai is a postdoctoral scholar at the [Center for Social Data Analytics](https://soda.la.psu.edu/the-center/) (C-SoDA) at Pennsylvania State University. Her research examines public opinion and elite behavior in comparative contexts and within the United States, using thousands of national survey datasets, millions of social media posts, Bayesian and text analysis, and machine learning methods.
